backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - v2 with full GUTT documentation context (same as Claude/Ollama)
original_prompt: Land a time to meet about Project Alpha with Chris, Sangya, and Kat for 1 hour in the next 2 weeks. Schedule over 1:1s and lunches if needed and work around Kat's schedule. Make the meeting in person and add a room.

gutts.name: Parse Meeting Request
gutts.capability: Extract meeting details such as participants, duration, timeframe, constraints, and preferences from natural language prompt
gutts.user_goal: Understand the full set of requirements for the requested meeting
gutts.evidence: Prompt specifies participants (Chris, Sangya, Kat), duration (1 hour), timeframe (next 2 weeks), constraints (schedule over 1:1s and lunches if needed, work around Kat's schedule), and preferences (in person, add a room)

gutts.name: Resolve Participant Identities
gutts.capability: Map participant names to their corresponding calendar identities and contact information
gutts.user_goal: Ensure the system knows exactly which calendars to check for availability
gutts.evidence: Participants mentioned by first name only: Chris, Sangya, Kat

gutts.name: Retrieve Participant Calendars
gutts.capability: Access and retrieve availability data for all participants within the specified timeframe
gutts.user_goal: Obtain accurate availability windows for all required attendees
gutts.evidence: Need to find a time in the next 2 weeks for Chris, Sangya, and Kat

gutts.name: Retrieve Kat's Constraints
gutts.capability: Identify and extract Kat-specific scheduling constraints and preferences from her calendar
gutts.user_goal: Respect Kat's schedule as a higher-priority constraint
gutts.evidence: Prompt explicitly says 'work around Kat's schedule'

gutts.name: Apply Override Rules
gutts.capability: Determine which existing events (1:1s, lunches) can be overridden and under what conditions
gutts.user_goal: Allow rescheduling or overriding of lower-priority events to accommodate the new meeting
gutts.evidence: Prompt states 'Schedule over 1:1s and lunches if needed'

gutts.name: Compute Common Availability
gutts.capability: Calculate overlapping free time slots for all participants within the given timeframe, respecting constraints and override rules
gutts.user_goal: Find a feasible 1-hour slot for all participants
gutts.evidence: Meeting must include all three participants for 1 hour in the next 2 weeks

gutts.name: Select Optimal Time Slot
gutts.capability: Choose the best available time slot based on constraints, preferences, and minimal disruption
gutts.user_goal: Pick the most suitable time for everyone involved
gutts.evidence: Must work around Kat's schedule and override 1:1s/lunches only if necessary

gutts.name: Find Available Room
gutts.capability: Locate and reserve an available physical meeting room matching the selected time slot
gutts.user_goal: Ensure the meeting is in person with a reserved room
gutts.evidence: Prompt specifies 'Make the meeting in person and add a room'

gutts.name: Create and Send Meeting Invite
gutts.capability: Generate the meeting event with all details and send invitations to participants
gutts.user_goal: Finalize the meeting and inform all attendees
gutts.evidence: After selecting time and room, the meeting must be scheduled and participants notified
